hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT sessions.session_id as sessionID, sessions.net_id as netID, sessions.status, sessions.slot_counter as slotCounter, sessions.no_of_slots as noOfSlots, sessions.comment, sessions.location, DATE_FORMAT(sessions.date,'%a, %b %d %Y') as date, TIME_FORMAT(sessions.starttime,'%h:%i %p') as starttime, TIME_FORMAT(sessions.endtime,'%h:%i %p') as endtime FROM sessions WHERE sessions.net_id = :netID ORDER BY sessions.date ASC

SELECT sessions.session_id as sessionID, sessions.net_id as netID, sessions.status, sessions.slot_counter as slotCounter, sessions.no_of_slots as noOfSlots, sessions.comment, sessions.location, DATE_FORMAT(sessions.date,'%a, %b %d %Y') as date, TIME_FORMAT(sessions.starttime,'%h:%i %p') as starttime, TIME_FORMAT(sessions.endtime,'%h:%i %p') as endtime FROM sessions WHERE sessions.net_id = :netID AND (sessions.status = 'SCHEDULED' OR sessions.status = 'STARTED') AND sessions.date <= :date ORDER BY sessions.date ASC

SELECT users.firstname, users.lastname, appointments.slot_number, appointments.appointment_id, appointments.status FROM appointments JOIN users ON users.net_id = appointments.net_id WHERE appointments.session_id = :sessionID ORDER BY appointments.slot_number ASC

SELECT users.firstname, users.lastname, sessions.session_id, DATE_FORMAT(sessions.date,'%a, %b %d %Y') as date, TIME_FORMAT(sessions.starttime,'%h:%i %p') as starttime, TIME_FORMAT(sessions.endtime,'%h:%i %p') as endtime, sessions.status as sesStatus, sessions.location, appointments.net_id, appointments.slot_number, appointments.status as appStatus FROM appointments JOIN sessions on appointments.session_id=sessions.session_id JOIN users on users.net_id=sessions.net_id WHERE appointments.net_id= :netID ORDER BY appointments.session_id DESC

SELECT users.firstname, users.lastname, sessions.session_id, DATE_FORMAT(sessions.date,'%a, %b %d %Y') as date, TIME_FORMAT(sessions.starttime,'%h:%i %p') as starttime, TIME_FORMAT(sessions.endtime,'%h:%i %p') as endtime, sessions.status as sesStatus, sessions.location, appointments.net_id, appointments.slot_number, appointments.status as appStatus FROM appointments JOIN sessions on appointments.session_id=sessions.session_id JOIN users on users.net_id=sessions.net_id WHERE appointments.net_id= :netID and appointments.status = 'SCHEDULED' ORDER BY appointments.session_id DESC
SELECT appointments.net_id from appointments where appointments.net_id= :netID and appointments.status = 'NO SHOW' and appointments.date between adddate(now(), -7) and now()

Select sessions.session_id, DATE_FORMAT(sessions.date,'%a, %b %d %Y') as date, TIME_FORMAT(sessions.starttime,'%h:%i %p') as starttime, TIME_FORMAT(sessions.endtime,'%h:%i %p') as endtime from sessions where sessions.net_id= :netID and sessions.status = "SCHEDULED" and sessions.date > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP and sessions.slot_counter < sessions.no_of_slots ORDER BY sessions.date ASC

SELECT announcements.announcement_id as announcementId, announcements.net_id as netId, DATE_FORMAT(announcements.date, '%b %d %Y') as date, announcements.priority, announcements.title, users.firstname as firstName, users.branch as branch, announcements.message, users.lastname as lastName FROM users, announcements WHERE #BRANCH_CONDITION# announcements.net_id=users.net_id AND announcements.date BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate ORDER BY announcements.priority DESC,announcements.date DESC, users.lastname ASC ;
